C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               343   String _themeLabel(AppTheme theme) {        
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               344     switch (theme) {                          
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               345       case AppTheme.light:                    
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               346         return 'Light';                       
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               347       case AppTheme.dark:                     
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               348         return 'Dark';                        
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               349       case AppTheme.amoled:                   
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               350         return 'AMOLED Black';                
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               351       case AppTheme.system:                   
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               352         return 'Follow System';               
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               353     }                                         
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               354   }                                           
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               356   String _languageLabel(AppLanguage lang) {   
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               357     switch (lang) {                           
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\settings_screen.dart                               358       case AppLanguage.english:

C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\core\services\settings_service.dart                522 class ScanSettings {                          
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\core\services\settings_service.dart                523   final String defaultTargetCidr;             
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\core\services\settings_service.dart                524   final ScanMode scanMode;                    
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\core\services\settings_service.dart                526   final bool hostDiscoveryEnabled;            
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\core\services\settings_service.dart                527   final bool fullScanAllHosts;

C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           398     Color accent;                             
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           399     switch (i.severity) {                     
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           400       case AiSeverity.high:                   
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           401         accent = cs.error;                    
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           402         break;                                
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           403       case AiSeverity.medium:                 
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           404         accent = cs.tertiary;                 
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           405         break;                                
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           406       case AiSeverity.low:

C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           517       if (h.risk == RiskLevel.high) score -...

C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           519       if (h.openPorts.length > 10) score -= 5;
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           520     }                                         
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           522     if (score < 0) score = 0;                 
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           523     if (score > 100) score = 100;             
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           524     return score;                             
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\dashboard\dashboard_screen.dart           525   }

C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             747   String _themeLabel(int value) {             
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             748     switch (value) {                          
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             749       case 1:

C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             752         return 'Dark';                        
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             753       case 3:                                 
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             754         return 'SCAN-X Dark';                 
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             755       default:                                
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             756         return 'System default';              
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             757     }                                         
C:\Users\Acer\scanx\scan-x\lib\features\settings\settings_screen.dart             758   }
